segments.text: Hello , can you tell me how to use the telephone ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you want to order meals , call 8801.If you need other help , call 8803 and someone will be there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you so much . By the way , is there a mail service ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , you can take your letters to the counter over there .
segments.speaker: S2
